text:
There's a guy called Troy Ericson who says he has a snippet of code that gets your email out of promotions and into primary. 

I've not worked with him, just came across him via a webinar where he seemed interesting. 

He seems to have lots of testimonials affirming that it's true re the snippet. He charges for it, and I don't know how much, but you can check out <http://emailparamedic.com|emailparamedic.com> if interested.

I never felt strongly enough about it to contact him, but maybe if I had a direct sales type list and a big enough list I would.
